capabilities.name: backup_create
capabilities.description: Create a backup of a file before making big changes. The backup includes timestamp information and maintains the original directory structure.

capabilities.name: backup_list
capabilities.description: List all available backups for a file, including their timestamps and locations. Useful for finding specific versions to restore.

capabilities.name: backup_restore
capabilities.description: Restore a file from a previous backup using its timestamp. Use this to revert changes or recover previous versions.

capabilities.name: backup_folder_create
capabilities.description: Create a backup of a folder before making structural changes. The backup includes timestamp information and maintains the original directory structure.

capabilities.name: backup_folder_list
capabilities.description: List all available backups for a folder, including their timestamps and locations. Useful for finding specific versions to restore.

capabilities.name: backup_folder_restore
capabilities.description: Restore a folder from a previous backup using its timestamp. Use this to revert changes or recover previous versions.

capabilities.name: backup_list_all
capabilities.description: List all backup files in both the main backup directory and emergency backup directory.

capabilities.name: mcp_cancel
capabilities.description: Cancel an ongoing backup or restore operation. Use this to stop long-running operations safely.
